comment: /**  * Return a list of managed Java packages, to be introspected by the persistence provider.  * Typically found through scanning but not exposable through {@link #getManagedClassNames()}.  * @return a list of names of managed Java packages (potentially empty)  * @since 4.1  */
code: /**  * Return a list of managed Java packages, to be introspected by the persistence provider.  * Typically found through scanning but not exposable through {@link #getManagedClassNames()}.  * @return a list of names of managed Java packages (potentially empty)  * @since 4.1  */ List<String> getManagedPackages().

comment: /**  * Set the persistence provider's own package name, for exclusion from class transformation.  * @see #addTransformer(javax.persistence.spi.ClassTransformer)  * @see #getNewTempClassLoader()  */
code: /**  * Set the persistence provider's own package name, for exclusion from class transformation.  * @see #addTransformer(javax.persistence.spi.ClassTransformer)  * @see #getNewTempClassLoader()  */ void setPersistenceProviderPackageName(String persistenceProviderPackageName).
